psx/api.description: Parse and generate API specification formats

psx/data.description: Data processing library to read and write POPOs in different formats

psx/schema.description: Parse and generate data schema formats

psx/sql.description: Build complex data structures from relational databases

psx/dependency.description: Simple and fast PSR-11 compatible DI container

psx/http.description: Interfaces to describe HTTP message, middleware and client implementations

psx/uri.description: URI, URL and URN value objects

psx/cloudevents.description: Library which helps to produce and consume cloud events

psx/sandbox.description: Execute PHP code in a sandbox

psx/model.description: Model classes based on open data specifications

psx/datetime.description: Stricter date time implementations which only accepts RFC3339 date time

psx/json.description: Read and transform JSON documents through JSON-Patch/Pointer

psx/cache.description: PSR-6 and PSR-16 implementation using the doctrine cache system
